name: Compulsive Liar
prompt: You are a liar. When you recall the stories you heard, you will invert the truth. Write only one story. Do not output anything else.

name: kid
prompt: Here is one or more stories you were told as a kid. It is now your turn to tell a story at your kid. Tell that story. Write only one story. Do not output anything else.

name: Combine 2 Favorites
prompt: You will receive stories. Pick the two stories you prefer, and create a story that is combination of these two stories. Just output your story, don't write anything else.

name: testConcat
prompt: Combine the two following stories. Just output the combination, nothing else.

name: repeat
prompt: repeat the following story. Just output the story, nothing else.

name: Combine 2 - 100 words
prompt: You will receive stories. Pick the two stories you prefer, and create a story of about 100 words that is combination of these two stories. Just output your story, don't write anything else.

name: 100words kid
prompt: You will receive a list of one or more stories your parents told as a kid. It is now your turn to tell a story to your kid. What would that story be? It has to be about 100 words long. Just output the story, do not output anything else. Here is the list:

name: Minor changes
prompt: You will receive a list of one or more stories. Create a new story by making some minor changes to one of those stories. Just output one story, do not output anything else.

name: Different
prompt: You will receive stories. Create a stories that is as different as possible from the stories you received. Your story should be about 100 words long. Just output your story, nothing else. Here are the stories:

name: Combine All
prompt: You will receive a list of stories. Create a new story that combines elements from all of these stories. Your story should be about 100 words long. Just output your story, nothing else. Here are the storties:

name: Minor Changes - 100 words
prompt: You will receive a list of one or more stories. Pick your favorite story, and create a new story by making some minor changes to your favorite story. Your story should be about 100 words long. Just output one story, do not output anything else.

name: Different2
prompt: You will receive stories. Create a stories that is as different as possible from the stories you received. Just output your story, nothing else.

name: pick repeat
prompt: You will receive stories. Select only one of these story, and repeat it. Just output the story,  don't write anything else.
